title: xerath flash slower when charging
body:
not sure if this happens with other champions but ive noticed when trying to do a flash - q play that flashing when charging takes a while to register regardless of time charged. 

is this intentional due to the game trying to perform the animation and then flashing or should this be fixed?

replies.body:
unintentional but hard to fix and so riot sort of leaves it in.
there are alot of these types of interactions that are just left in because it would be too much work to fix each one.
